emuInput.TitMainTitle: Jessie Vann handing down payment check to Clarence Rodgers, manager of Belmar Gardens, in office of Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 14, 1953, pg. 3 reads: "To Buy Home In Belmar Gardens - Mrs. Robert L. Vann, president and publisher of the Courier, is shown presenting her down-payment check for $1,200 to Clarence Rodgers, manager of Belmar Gardens. The development, a citizens' cooperative project, expects to begin building in March.  One of the streets in project will be called Vann Drive, in honor of Mrs. Vann's late husband, Editor Robert L. Vann."
